entry.title: First Post
entry.content:
Hello,

This is my very first blog post. Bear with me while I try my best not to screw everything up. It’s all completey new to me :

  • First time using Octopress
  • First time using GitHub Pages
  • First time using a git-enabled blogging engine
  • First time starting a blog using english only (sort of, we’ll see)
  • First time blogging not from my local laptop, but from a VPS shell instead

This is all to remind you that there surelly will be mistakes. Most likely lots of them. But it’s OK, I’ll try to minimize them with time.
